Rulings.Tengu:
●The effect of “Layard the Liberator” is a Continuous Effect, and cannot be chained to. You will add 2 of your Fairy-Type monsters to your hand immediately after a Counter Trap’s effects have resolved.
●“Layard the Liberator’s” effect will not activate if you have only 1 Fairy-Type monster removed from play.
●This effect targets 2 Fairy-Type monsters.

Rulings.Base: 1. The effect of "Layard the Liberator" is a Continuous Effect, and cannot be chained to. You will add 2 of your Fairy-Type monsters to your hand immediately after a Counter Trap's effects have resolved.\n2. The effect of "Layard the Liberator" will not activate if you have only 1 Fairy-Type monster removed from play.\n3. This effect targets 2 Fairy-Type monsters.
